tool_description: Records and analyzes quality control inspections, defect reports, and supplier quality performance to maintain procurement standards.

inspection_id.description: Unique identifier for the quality inspection

supplier_id.description: Supplier identifier for the inspected items

items_inspected.description: Array of item descriptions that were inspected

quality_scores.description: Quality scores for each inspected item (0-100)

defects_found.description: Array of defects or issues identified

pass_fail_status.description: Overall inspection result: pass, conditional_pass, fail

inspector_notes.description: Additional notes from the quality inspector

corrective_action_required.description: Whether corrective action is needed from supplier

error_messages: Invalid inspection_id: Inspection ID must be provided and unique
Invalid supplier_id: No supplier found with the provided supplier_id
Invalid purchase_order_id: No purchase order found with the provided ID
Mismatched array lengths: items_inspected and quality_scores arrays must have the same length
Invalid quality scores: All quality scores must be between 0 and 100
Invalid pass_fail_status: Status must be one of [pass, conditional_pass, fail]
Future inspection date: Inspection date cannot be in the future
usage: Provide inspection_id, supplier_id, purchase_order_id, inspection_date, items_inspected array, quality_scores array, and pass_fail_status. Optionally include defects_found, inspector_notes, and corrective_action_required flag.

average_quality_score.description: Average quality score across all inspected items

inspection_summary.description: Summary of inspection results and findings

recommendations.description: Array of recommendations based on inspection results

quality_trend.description: Quality trend analysis for this supplier
